item.title: Apprentice Amalgamator (Level 2)
item.description: Merge conflicted file with git mergetool.

item.title: Butcher (Level 4)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.

item.title: Goldsmith (Level 4)
item.description: Reviewed patches before committing with git diff --cached.

item.title: Author (Level 6)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Bonsai Artist (Level 1)
item.description: Pruned stale branches from a remote with remote prune.

item.title: Apprentice Merchant (Level 1)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Product Manager (Level 4)
item.description: Stash the changes in a dirty working directory away with git stash.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 6)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Apprentice Gardner (Level 1)
item.description: Shows the commit ancestry graph with git show-branch

item.title: Apprentice Chimney Sweeper (Level 2)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Caretaker
item.description: Added a .gitignore file to a repository.

item.title: Traveler (Level 4)
item.description: Streamed changes between another rcs with git svn or git p4.

item.title: Apprentice Architect (Level 3)
item.description: Created a new repository with git init.

item.title: Collector (Level 4)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Banker (Level 1)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Collector (Level 2)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Apprentice Gipsy (Level 1)
item.description: Create, list, delete a tag signed with GPG using git tag

item.title: Author (Level 5)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Apprentice Butcher (Level 3)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.
